pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 30, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Brampton, Ontario

1:45 p.m.  The Prime Minister will visit ABC Technologies, and meet with employees to discuss the benefits of the new NAFTA for workers and the economy. A media availability will follow.

303 Orenda Road West B

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the main entrance no later than 12:45 p.m.

3:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will meet with the board of the Automotive Parts Manufacturers’ Association.

Closed to media.
